H0.text: Chemical is the type of energy into which panels of solar cells convert solar energy to provide energy for use in homes.

H1.text: Electrical is the type of energy that solar energy is converted into by panels of solar cells used to collect energy from the Sun for use in homes.

H2.text: Geothermal is the type of energy into which panels of solar cells collect energy from the Sun and convert it into energy for use in homes.

H3.text: Hydroelectric is the type of energy into which solar energy is converted by panels of solar cells that collect energy from the Sun for use in homes.

A4.text: A solar cell, also known as a photovoltaic cell (PV cell), is an electronic device that converts the energy of light directly into electricity by means of the photovoltaic effect.
